
# Basic checkbox

```R
shinyApp(
  ui = webpage(
    checkboxInput(
      id = "test",
      choices = "hello"
    )
  ),
  server = function(input, output) {
    observe({
      print(input$test)
    })
  }
)
```

# Checkboxes are also groups

```R
shinyApp(
  ui = webpage(
    checkboxInput(
      id = "test",
      choices = c("hello", "world")
    )
  ),
  server = function(input, output) {
    observe({
      print(input$test)
    })
  }
)
```
